content: For release on delivery   7:15 p.m. EDT   April 8, 2013           Stress Testing Banks:  What Have We Learned?      Remarks by    Ben S. Bernanke    Chairman    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at    “Maintaining Financial Stability:  Holding a Tiger by the Tail”    a Financial Markets Conference   Sponsored by the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta    Stone Mountain, Georgia          April 8, 2013
